attributes.action: ensure that the personal information contained within GP and Hospital Medical Records is not disclosed for commercial exploitation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The purpose of the petition is to persuade HM Governement that as a matter of public policy it is completely unacceptable and undesirable to weaken in any way the long-established principle that GP and Hospital Medical Records remain confidential and are not to be subject to commercial exploitation.
